page.title: 04NEW STADIUM AT STOKE GIFFORD
page.content: There are plans for a new sports complex to act as a regional centre. Sport 2000 want a sports stadium with 15000 seats for athletics,greyhound racing and a pitch for Bristol Rovers FC. Also they want a covered tennis school and club with coaching for hockey and cricket,and a sports hall for martial arts,basketball etc. They want to build here because it is close to Parkway station, and the M4 and M5 motorways. It's also very much cheaper land. The local people are against it because of noise,vandals damaging property, heavy traffic and lower house prices. They sent 649 letters of complaint to the planning committee. Local people are now forming petitions,action groups are writing to local MP's. A Q.C. will fight their case in the Courts.
